name: The Adventures of Red Ball
description:
The Adventures of Red Ball

-----------------------------------

This was a game that I made by myself for fun.

Audio and a couple of textures are not owned by me.

Controls:

Movement- Left and Right Arrow

Jump- Up Arrow

Attack- Spacebar

Note: There is a bit of trouble with colliders, and in order to attack an enemy the sword must first not be touching the enemy, and then press the attack button and then move towards the enemy. I will look into this problem in the future.
